name: Thai Curried Chicken
ingredients: 4 boneless chicken breasts, cut in bite-sized pieces
1 1/2 teaspoons chili paste or Sambal Oelek
1/4 teaspoon laos powder, also called galangal

instructions.en: Put the chicken in a glass bowl; stir in all of the remaining ingredients.
instructions.sk: Vložte kura do sklenenej misky; primiešajte všetky zostávajúce ingrediencie.
instructions.ja: ガラスのボウルに鶏肉を入れ、残りの材料をすべて加えてかき混ぜます。

instructions.en: Simmer everything in either a large non-stick skillet or wok until the chicken is cooked through.
instructions.sk: Varte všetko na miernom ohni buď vo veľkej nepriľnavej panvici alebo vo woku, kým nie je kura úplne prepečené.
instructions.ja: 大きな非粘着性のフライパンまたは中華鍋で、鶏肉に火が通るまですべてを煮込みます。

instructions.en: Remove the bay leaf before serving.
instructions.ja: 提供する前にローリエの葉を取り除きます。

notes: Makes 4 servings. Do not freeze. Serve over chopped cauliflower as a replacement for rice. *Laos powder is also called galangal.
